content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal mine at position(x=41, y=-82)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41, y=-82) 
-  Wooden chest (position x=40.5, y=-83.5) 
-  Wooden chest (position x=41.5, y=-83.5) 
-  Burner inserter (position x=39.5, y=-81.5)

### Furnace at position(x=0, y=0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position x=0, y=0)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting from a chest
-  Ensure the chest is not full before attempting to extract items
### Errors when inserting into a burner-mining-drill
-  Ensure the burner-mining-drill's inventory is not full before attempting to insert items
### Errors when mining with a burner-mining-drill
-  Ensure the chest at the drop position is not full before mining, empty the chest to continue mining

### NAMESPACE
*   No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
*   No important variables have been assigned.
